function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of entrepreneurial orientation in firms","Impact":"Reduced ability to innovate and undertake risky ventures, leading to decreased resilience in the face of crises like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote a culture of entrepreneurial orientation within firms through training and incentive programs","Technologies":"Training and development programs for fostering innovation and risk-taking","People":"Firm owners, managers, and employees","Owner":"Firm leadership and management"},{"Description":"Lack of resilience in the entrepreneurial ecosystem","Impact":"Inability to seize opportunities in chaotic and uncertain times, leading to economic stagnation and missed growth opportunities","Mitigation":"Interventions to revitalize the entrepreneurial ecosystem through meaningful collaboration and support systems","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, support networks, and ecosystem development tools","People":"Entrepreneurs, business owners, policymakers, and support organizations","Owner":"Policymakers and support organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate preparation of socio-economic systems for future shocks","Impact":"Vulnerability to future crises and shocks, leading to potential economic instability and setbacks","Mitigation":"Adopting a systems approach based on resilience to prepare socio-economic systems for future shocks","Technologies":"Resilience assessment tools, crisis simulation software, and resilience planning frameworks","People":"Policymakers, economic planners, and system administrators","Owner":"Policymakers and system administrators"}]}
